text: bhūmiyil nāśamuṇṭākkunnatil ninn (janaṅṅaḷe) taṭayunna, (nanmayuṭe) pāramparyamuḷḷa oru vibhāgaṁ niṅṅaḷkkumumpuḷḷa talamuṟakaḷil ninn entukeāṇṭ uṇṭāyilla? avaril ninn nāṁ rakṣappeṭutti eṭutta kūṭṭattil peṭṭa curukkaṁ cilareāḻike. ennāl akramakārikaḷ taṅṅaḷkk nalkappeṭṭa sukhāḍambaraṅṅaḷuṭe pinnāle pēākukayāṇ ceytat‌. avar kuṟṟavāḷikaḷāyirikkunnu
